PHRASE.LANG: 【Drey】ノアールノートブック＆ペン
"He stopped and looked closer. Could it be…? It was! Everything was falling into place." [#Legal]
« Il s'arrêta et regarda de plus près. Était-il possible que… Mais oui ! Tout devenait clair. » [#Legal]
"Er hielt inne und sah genau hin. Könnte das sein ...? Ja, das war es! Alles fügte sich zusammen." [#Legal]
"Si fermò e guardò con più attenzione. Poteva essere…? Certo che sì! I conti iniziavano a tornare". [#Legal]
"Al echar un vistazo detenidamente se percató. ¡Sí! ¡Todo tenia sentido ahora!". [#Legal]
「彼は立ち止まり、食い入るように見つめた。そして、やっと謎が解けた。」 [#Legal]
"He stopped and looked closer. Could it be…? It was! Everything was falling into place." [#Legal]
"He stopped and looked closer. Could it be…? It was! Everything was falling into place." [#Legal]
